divs: sighting detailsthree round orange lights came thru the sky as high as a plane (to high to be a fire work)...they went slow and then just turned and faded ..the lights were much bigger than shown in the picture , we all could not figure out what they were .perfectly round balls of orange ... ------------------------------------------------------------------------ (the below is not for publishing just for your info) note: this is a cut and paste of an email i received. person wishes to remain anon. they sent pics but i'm to puter stupid to know how to save them and add them here but will fwd email with pics, minus senders info, to you if you wish. also i really don't know what county they're in? catawba sounds familiar. thank you, *wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms.
